TypeSignature.Value: public class FixedDocumentSequence : System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement, IServiceProvider, System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext

.class public auto ansi FixedDocumentSequence extends System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement implements class System.IServiceProvider, class System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild, class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext

Docs.summary: Hosts one or more elements that define a sequence of fixed documents.

remarks.format:
## Remarks FixedDocumentSequence hosts an ordered sequence of one or more fixed documents that are organized as a single unit.
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference> is the only allowable child element in a FixedDocumentSequence. Each <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference> refers to a single <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>. Document reference elements must be in sequential order, matching the order in which the fixed documents are processed.
A collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentReference> elements contained in a FixedDocumentSequence can be obtained using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence.References%2A> property.
## Examples The following example show how to obtain the FixedDocumentSequence of an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> by use of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.GetFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method.
[!code-cs[XpsSave#XpsSaveLoadFixedContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsSave/Window1.xaml.cs#xpssaveloadfixedcontent)] [!code-vb[XpsSave#XpsSaveLoadFixedContent](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/xpssave/window1.xaml.vb#xpssaveloadfixedcontent)]

Gets the paginator for the that provides page-oriented services such as getting a particular page and repaginating in response to changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If you need a paginator with automatic repagination in responses to changes, such as adding content to the document, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator> which itself inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>.
